subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tamika Catchings had 14 points, 12 rebounds and 7 assists as the Indiana Fever moved within one victory of the W.N.B.A. title by defeating the Phoenix Mercury, 86-85, in Game 3 of the finals.
snippet: Tamika Catchings had 14 points, 12 rebounds and 7 assists as the Indiana Fever moved within one victory of the W.N.B.A. title by defeating the Phoenix Mercury, 86-85, in Game 3 of the finals.
